name: Star Kingdom - The Elements
description:
Star Kingdom is an astrology game that helps you discover how the planets have played such a big part in your life. Enter your birthday and see where the planets were aligned and what they tell you about how you interact with your world. Learn how each element, Earth, Water, Air and Fire affect your daily life.

In this game, you are a wizard that must reactivate the Temple of the Stars. Dark skulls have absorbed the light energy that keeps magic from the realm of the living. Reactivate each of your planets and learn how the zodiac constellations color your daily life and personality. Remove the fog of darkness that surrounds the temple to learn the secrets within.
